divs: sighting detailson january 19th, 2012 at 7:38 pm. s i came outside from the walmart store which is located on the east edge of lake wales, i observed the following. i observed an orange glowing disk shaped object (brighter and larger than jupiter)in the sky east of my location. the object was seen over what are orange groves and the sky was clear with no obstructions. the object was travelling at a slow speed going south. the object stayed on a straight line. after a few minutes the object which was glowing orange blinked out and could not bee seen again. i am a retired police officer\deputy and i belonged to mufon many years ago.
Summary: Glowing orange color disk shape object
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Wales
There were 2 other sightings in Lake Wales on or around January 19th 2012
